author: Gary Leung
comment: My default face on my Tag Heuer Connected 45!

author: Shazer Muñoz
comment: This watch face is awesome!! Great job! Classy.

author: Timothy Connor
comment: I've been looking for a Japanese watch face and this works well. Would it be possible to use both 号 and 日 as the counter for days on the calendar? That way it will work in both languages. (Battery would be 電池.) Thanks for the update!
title: Nice!

author: Pegasus Mak

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: A new setting featuring traditional formal capital numerals (大寫) is now available.

title: 5 star if it can use transitional Chinese charaters

author: Frankie Ramirez
comment: Looks awesome and works as advertised. Been looking for a while for a Kanji watch face that looks good. Thank you.

author: tayler choate
comment: The watch face should make the Chinese white and the face black when it moves to the dimmed display I have the watch urbane.

reply.author: Martin Halachev
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback! The watch face is now updated to turn black in ambient mode.

title: I like the watch face
